strategy: Iyanden Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Aspect Warrior formations, Titans, Knights and the Avatar have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Eldar Craftworld Iyanden .

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Iyanden Hosts
sections.description: One Spirit Walker for each one Spirit Guard or Spirit Blades

formations.name: Spirit Guard
formations.units: One Spiritseer character and six Wraithguards

formations.name: Spirit Blades
formations.units: One Spiritseer character and six Wraithblades

formations.name: Spirit Walker
formations.units: One Spiritseer character and six Wraithlords

sections.name: Iyanden Troupes
sections.description: Up to three for each Iyanden host taken

formations.name: Guardian Warhost
formations.units: One Farseer unit and seven Guardians
extraUnits: Heavy Weapons, Support Weapons, Wraithguard, Wraithlord.

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Warhost
formations.units: Six Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Shining Spears, Striking Scorpions, Swooping Hawks, Warp Spiders

formations.name: Engine of Vaul Troupe
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
upgrades: Add one or two additional Engine of Vaul for 200 points each, chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

formations.name: Ranger Troupe
upgrades: Add up to four Eldar Rangers for 25 points each

sections.name: Iyanden Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Iyanden Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Wraithseer
items.description: Replace one Spiritseer character with an Wraithseer

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add one Eldar Exarch character to an Eldar Aspect Warrior unit

items.name: Firestorm
items.description: Replace one Falcon with a Firestorm

items.name: Heavy Weapons
items.description: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Eldar Heavy Weapon Platform units

items.name: Support Weapons
items.description: Add three Eldar Support Weapon Platform units

items.name: Transport
items.description: Add enough Wave Serpents to transport all the units in the formation with no transport spaces left over if at all possible after any upgrades have been added to the formation.

items.name: Vypers
items.description: Replace any number of Eldar Jetbikes with Eldar Vypers
